resources.string: Your total calories intake from yesterday was:

Author: Shu Chen

Fragments will show in yellow background.

This activity also support a chinese version.

Three Toolbar Items:

1. Calculate average calories eaten per day.

2: Calculate total calories eaten by day.

3: Instruction about this activity.

To review or edit nutrition details: click any records on display view.

To add a food item: click Add A Food Item button on the bottom.

Find out more details by clicking floating action button in fragment.

To store or update nutrition details:

 1. Please fill out all empty fields.

 2. Food Item field must and only contain letters.

 3. Fields for Calories, Fat and Carbohydrate are numbers only.

Information will store into a database and can be used for calculation and future analysis purposes.

Click Delete button to delete current existing data.

Cancel button allows you to go back to previous activity without saving.
